Product Details

Wüsthof Grand Prix 6" Cook's Knife, Model 458516

This relatively new addition to the WÜSTHOF family features precision forged blade/bolster/tang permanently bonded to molded pebble-grained, slip-resistant handles. Contemporary, authoritative look with WÜSTHOF'S signature weight, heft and balance.

Cook's Knife
The cooking enthusiasts best friend available in blade sizes to fit any skill and performance levels. Owning just one may not be enough!

Features:

  • 6-inch blade, great for mincing, chopping, and slicing
  • Blade is hand forged from a single piece of high-carbon stainless steel
  • Ergonomic, permanently bonded black handle
  • Lifetime warranty
  • Made in Germany

Approximate Weight:

  • Shipping: 2 lbs

Warranty Information:

  • Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): Lifetime Guarantee covering material and workmanship defects.

    Cutlery by WÜSTHOF is manufactured with the highest quality standards and exceeds the required DIN (German Industry Standard) as well as the EN (European Standard).

    We are assured of our quality and wish you much pleasure with our products. Your satisfaction is the quality measurement for our assortment.

to view warranty (.pdf)

* Wüsthof-Trident knives are dishwasher-safe. However, Wüsthof-Trident strongly recommends hand washing in warm, sudsy water and towel drying.

Design and specifications are subject to change without notice.
